item.title: Deactivating Instagram
item.description: A couple weeks ago, I decided to deactivate my Instagram account. Why? I found myself spending too much time watching Reels, which is Instagram’s clone of Tiktok. For the same reason, I deleted Youtube from my phone. I never open Instagram or Youtube with the intention of watching those short-form videos but I somehow always end up watching them mindlessly. It is like a blackhole that sucks you in without you noticing.
